This application allows the automatic exercise of options to customers who are on primary side of a trade and have bought the option concerned. The user enters the option details (contract code, maturity, strike and call or put). There are also facilities to run this either for all customers or against a single customer or portfolio. It should be noted that this process will exercise ALL relevent trades found and does NOT take into account exercising profitability, i.e. is an option in or out of the money.
The exercise process is activated when the record is Authorised.
